title: Knowing God As A Father | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Knowing God As A Father | Joel Osteen
description:
Many people know God as their Savior, but when you know God as a Father, it takes on a whole new meaning. He is with you as a constant source of strength and encouragement.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
